content.name: firstApp
content.label: Is this your VERY FIRST app under your App Store account?

content.name: apptitle
content.label: App Title
content.description: The title of the app displayed on the user's device. We recommend 10 characters or less

content.name: appname
content.label: App Name
content.description: The title of the app displayed in the app store. Max 30 Characters.

content.name: subtitleforios
content.label: Subtitle for iOS
content.description: Subtitles are limited to 30 characters and appear below your app’s name throughout the App Store in iOS 11. More Information available from Here. Max 30 Characters.

content.name: shortdescription
content.label: Short Description
content.description: The Short Description on your app’s Store Listing page, is the first descriptive text potential users will see when looking at your app’s Store Listing from the Play Store app. Max 80 characters.

content.name: promotionaltext
content.label: Promotional Text
content.description: Your app’s promotional text appears at the top of the description and is limited to 170 characters. More Information available from Here. Max 170 Characters.

content.name: fulldescription
content.label: Full Description
content.description:
Max 4,000 characters.

Important Note for Android App: For Google Play Store search, please refer to their best practice document. They recommend using SEO Best Practices in your description.

content.name: featuregraphic
content.label: Feature Graphic
content.description:
• 1024w x 500h JPG or 24-bit PNG (no alpha)
  • Learn More about Google Play guidelines for Graphic assets, screenshots & video
  • Your Feature Graphic is a powerful tool to show off your creative assets and attract users. The Feature Graphic is displayed at the top of your Store Listing page in the Play Store app.

content.name: keywords
content.label: Keywords
content.description: One or more keywords that describe your app. Keywords make App Store search results more accurate. Separate keywords with a comma. 100 characters including spaces and commas.

content.name: supporturl
content.label: Support URL
content.description: A URL with support information for your app.

content.name: marketingurl
content.label: Marketing URL
content.description: A URL with marketing information about your app. This URL will be visible on the App Store.

content.name: privacypolicyurl
content.label: Privacy Policy URL
content.description: A URL that links to your organization's privacy policy. Privacy policies are required for apps that are Made for Kids, offer auto-renewable In-App Purchases or free subscriptions, or as otherwise required by law. Privacy policies are also recommended for apps that collect user- or device-related data.

content.name: copyright
content.label: Copyright
content.description: The name of the person or entity that owns the exclusive rights to your app, preceded by the year the rights were obtained (for example, "2008 Acme Inc."). Do not provide a URL.

content.name: iosRelease
content.label: iOS Release
optionLabels: Automatically release this app once it is approved by Apple
Automatically release this app on the following date
Require a developer to manually release this app after it has been approved

content.html:
Please list the screens you’d like to use below.

Modo Labs will take the screenshots.
Please see App Store icon, app preview, and screenshots overview - App Store Connect Help for more information.

content.name: stickerPack
content.label: Have you created an iOS Sticker Pack?

yes.html: Please list the screens you’d like to use in the table below. Modo Labs will take screenshots.
One of the Sticker Screenshots will highlight the stickers being used in conversation please select one (1) sticker to be highlighted, and the text message you would like to display

content.html: The version number of the app you are adding. Numbering should follow software versioning conventions (1.0; 2.0.1, etc ).

content.name: iosCategoryPrimary
content.label: Primary
content.description: More information for iOS, see the App Store Category Definitions

content.name: androidCategory
content.label: Android Category
content.description: More information for Android, see Select a Category for Your App or Game.

content.name: prolongedGraphicOrSadisticRealisticViolence
content.label: Prolonged Graphic or Sadistic Realistic Violence

content.name: alcoholTobaccoOrDrugUseReferences
content.label: Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

content.name: unrestrictedWebAccess
content.label: Unrestricted Web Access
content.description:
Unrestricted web access, such as with an embedded browser. This will make the rating 17+

Learn more.

content.name: violence
content.label: Violence
content.description:
Can the app contain violent material? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: sexuality
content.label: Sexuality
content.description:
Can the app contain sexual material or nudity (except in a natural or scientific setting)? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: language
content.label: Language
content.description:
Can the app contain any potentially offensive language? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: controlledSubstance
content.label: Controlled Substance
content.description:
Can the app contain references to or depictions of illegal drugs? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: communication
content.label: Communication
content.description:
Does the app natively allow users to interact or exchange content with other users through voice communication, text, or sharing images or audio? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: thirdParties
content.label: Third Parties
content.description:
Does the app share user-provided personal information with third parties? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: geolocation
content.label: Geolocation
content.description:
Does the app share the user's current physical location to other users? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.

content.name: digitalGoods
content.label: Digital Goods
content.description:
Does the app allow users to purchase digital goods? Learn more

Please note that this question does not refer to user-generated content.
